my wife hates me , she thinks i am lazy and poor.

i have 3 brothers.

content.text: Hey there!
Hey how is it going?
It's going good, I'm just getting ready for a baby shower.
Oh that's nice, how exciting!
I know, I'm so excited to be an uncle!
That's great, I'm sure you'll be a great uncle.
I'm trying to be, I'm bringing an amethyst to the shower because it promotes love and protection.
That's a great idea, I'm sure they'll love it.
Thanks, I'm just glad I could be a part of it.
It's good to hear that, do you have any other siblings?
Yeah, I have two older sisters and one older brother.
That's a lot of siblings, are you close with them all?
I am, we're all pretty close.
That's great, I wish I was closer to my siblings.
Well you can always try to be, it's never too late.
Yeah, I know. I'm just not sure how to start.
Well you could always try inviting them to do something together, like go out to eat or something.
That's a good idea, I'll try that.
Good luck! I'm sure it will work out.
Thanks! I hope so
